|brand = Hardkernel |model = ODROID-GO |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Super |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = portable game console |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = R-R-HKL-ODROID-GO3 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3326; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A35 |cpu1spd = 1.3 GHz<!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = XTX Tech;XT25F128B; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16LY-107:N; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, MicroSD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB Female Type-C
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MicroSD Card slot, LCD Display, Audio out (3.5mm), speaker, LiPo battery connector, I2C, GPIO, power switch |addchip = PMIC w/integrated CODEC;Rockchip;RK817;;1;,,, USB Power Distribution Switch;First Silicon;FC9516A;;1;,,, 4Î© High Speed Low Voltage 4:1 Multiplexer;SGMicro;SGM48780;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 01/2021 |estprice = 80 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0985Y1FW2 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Korea
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "HARDKERNEL", "ODROID-GO3", "REV 1.0 20200923 Made In Korea" and "2050" are silkscreened on board top. :"Made In Korea", "R-R-HKL-ODROID-GO3" and "Design by ruppi.kim@hardkernel.com" are silkscreened on board bottom.
{{See also|ODROID#Models}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3326 @1.3GHz :Quad-Core ARM Cortex-A35 *GPU: ''Mali-G31 MP2'' *Memory: 1GB (SDRAM) DDR3L *Storage: 16MB SPI NOR, TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *USB: 1x USB 2.0 *GPIO: 1x 10-pin port *Power Source: 3.7V/4000mAh Li-Polymer battery :recharge by 5V/1.5A via USB Type-C
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.odroid.com/odroid_go_super/start ''ODROID-GO-SUPER'' on '''ODROID''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/12/22/odroid-go-super-ubuntu-portable-gaming-console-gets-a-large-5-inch-display/ ''ODROID-Go Super Ubuntu portable gaming console gets a larger 5-inch display'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[https://liliputing.com/2021/01/odroid-go-super-is-an-80-ubuntu-powered-handheld-game-system.html ''ODROID-GO Super is an $80 Ubuntu-powered handheld game system'' on '''Liliputing''']
